SseSpecification.description: The configuration options for customer provided KMS encryption.

CustomerManagedKeyEnabled.description: Whether to encrypt the policy with the provided key or disable encryption

KmsKeyArn.description: KMS Key Arn used to encrypt the group policy

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

description: The AWS::EC2::VerifiedAccessGroup resource creates an AWS EC2 Verified Access Group.

CreationTime.description: Time this Verified Access Group was created.

Description.description: A description for the AWS Verified Access group.

LastUpdatedTime.description: Time this Verified Access Group was last updated.

Owner.description: The AWS account number that owns the group.

PolicyDocument.description: The AWS Verified Access policy document.

PolicyEnabled.description: The status of the Verified Access policy.

SseSpecification.description: The configuration options for customer provided KMS encryption.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

VerifiedAccessGroupArn.description: The ARN of the Verified Access group.

VerifiedAccessGroupId.description: The ID of the AWS Verified Access group.

VerifiedAccessInstanceId.description: The ID of the AWS Verified Access instance.
